text:
Hello there! Welcome to the world of PonziLand!

I'm Lazi, and I will explain the fundamentals of this game!

Right now, the world is full of empty lands. 

 Everyday, new lands are under auction for players to buy.
Here you can see your progress.
Click on the menu to explore more options.
You can customize your settings here.
Check out the leaderboard to see top players.
Visit the shop to buy new items.
Join a community to interact with other players.
Participate in events to win exclusive prizes.
Use the help section if you need assistance.
Keep an eye on notifications for updates.
You can log out from the settings menu.
Thank you for completing the tutorial!
